title: Training Dataset
description: Schema for representing datasets used to train or fine-tune models, including provenance, licensing, contributor influence, access control, and ethical metadata.

description.description: Narrative explanation of what the dataset contains and how it was assembled

custody_log.description: Chronological list of custody events for tamper-evident tracking and chain of custody

data_types.description: High-level categories of data present (e.g., text, image, audio, sensor-fusion)

format.description: Data file formats (e.g., CSV, JSON, TFRecord)

record_count.description: Approximate number of rows or records

size_bytes.description: Total uncompressed size (Unit: By, UCUM code for bytes)

created_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the dataset was first committed

license.description: Applicable usage license (e.g., CC-BY, MIT, proprietary)

restricted_use.description: Contexts in which use of the dataset is restricted or forbidden

bias_notes.description: Narrative or flagged notes on known biases

alignment_risks.description: Downstream risks related to model alignment or misuse

influenced_by.description: List of contributors or agents whose data influenced this dataset

size_bytes.description: File size (Unit: By, UCUM code for bytes)

attached_files.description: Optional list of files or hashes linked to this dataset

linked_tasks.description: Tasks where this dataset was created or used

provenance.description: Chain of custody or transformation steps

access_control.description: Who currently has access to this dataset

payments.description: Who has been paid in relation to this dataset

copy_count.description: How many known instances or backups of the dataset exist

derived_from.description: List of dataset IDs that this dataset was derived from

completeness.description: Data completeness ratio (Unit: 1, UCUM code for dimensionless unit)

accuracy.description: Data accuracy ratio (Unit: 1, UCUM code for dimensionless unit)

noise_level.description: Estimated noise level (Unit: %, UCUM code for percent)

resource_requirements.description: Computational resources required to process this dataset

memory_bytes.description: Estimated memory required (Unit: By, UCUM code for bytes)

processing_time_s.description: Estimated processing time (Unit: s, UCUM code for seconds)

storage_bytes.description: Total storage requirement including indices (Unit: By, UCUM code for bytes)

retention_period_days.description: Planned retention period (Unit: d, UCUM code for days)

archival.description: Archival metadata used to support long-term storage and data integrity

meta.description: Freeform metadata for internal versioning, annotations, tags, etc.
